dated and clunky due to its age but fun i had never played the original when i picked it up in the 2020s and i could still enjoy it kate is a bit awful as a character but oscar is great and the visuals are fun the puzzles can sometimes be a bit impossible in that early computer game way but if you are familiar with old games its nothing that out of the ordinary

fabulous  exactly my pace  slow no time limits no stress except a bit at the end when a madman is set on blowing me up  beautiful scenery great story  some of the puzzles needed help who knew i had to call my annoying mom once for help

now bear in mind this game is slow  slow by design youll walk around a lot walk up and down a lot of sets of steps and stairs then walk some more and then walk some more however youll also discover a stylish and charming adventure  if youve played benoit sokals previous game amerzone which i recommend as well youll also find some cool connective tissue in this story  ill also warn that this game uses some very outdated language in relation to disability
